name: Alien King
description:
This is a simple little game (low resolution) made in a retro style. All graphics and sounds are generated in code, so the media folder only contains the code.

This game was created using AppGameKit  Classic.

www.appgamekit.com                                                            

Use the 5 key to insert coin, and the 1 key to start the game.

Use the W-A-S-D keys for directional controls, and the Up-Arrow key to fire your weapons. Use your mouse for selecting tiles in the Bonus Stage. 

The 320x200 pixels resolution was the CGA standard, which was common in the DOS era.

Have Fun trying to make it to the Alien King level to defeat him!
